document.full_text: a 60-something albatross ranked as america's oldest free-flying bird has thrilled biologists by surviving a tsunami that struck the pacific island where it nests, the fish & wildlife service said on monday.
document.title: oldest wild bird in u.s. survives tsunami
lines_and_colors: a 60-something albatross ranked as america's oldest free-flying bird has thrilled biologists by surviving a tsunami that struck the pacific island where it nests, the fish & wildlife service said on monday.
